intro: Varronia barahonensis, commonly known as the Bahamian varronia, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean, particularly the Bahamas and the Turks and Caicos Islands. Varronia barahonensis is also notable for its medicinal uses in traditional Caribbean herbal remedies.
